documentation.purpose: Provides a type-safe API client for HTTP requests (GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE) with unified monitoring and error handling.

documentation.purpose: Provides real-time analysis and recommendations for player prop bets, including expected value, probability, confidence, and risk scoring.
